bean.description: The bean 'tagsConfigurator' is used to set up the configuration of the custom tags of consortium ESUP-Portail (see esup-commons.tld).

property.name: messagesInfoClass
property.description: The default value used for attribute infoClass of tags message and messages. It is the CSS class used for info messages.

property.name: messagesWarnClass
property.description: The default value used for attribute warnClass of tags message and messages. It is the CSS class used for warn messages.

property.name: messagesErrorClass
property.description: The default value used for attribute errorClass of tags message and messages. It is the CSS class used for error messages.

property.name: messagesFatalClass
property.description: The default value used for attribute fatalClass of tags message and messages. It is the CSS class used for fatal messages.

property.name: messagesLayout
property.description: The default value used for attribute layout of tag messages.

property.name: documentTitle
property.description: The default value for attribute title of tag document, used to generate the content of output tag TITLE, optional.

property.name: documentTitleI18nKey
property.description: The name oh the i18n key to use for the window title, optional. Overrides documentTitle.

property.name: doctype
property.description: The doctype of the document, optional.

property.name: servletMediaPath
property.description: The path to the media files, used for scripts.

property.name: portletMediaPath
property.description: The path to the media files, used for scripts and stylesheets.

property.name: scripts
property.description: A list of URLs that will be automatically included in the head part of the output document as scripts. Absolute URLs are used as-is, relative URLs are prefixed by property portletMediaPath or servletMediaPath.

property.name: stylesheets
property.description: A list of URLs that will be automatically included in the head part of the output document. Absolute URLs are used as-is, relative URLs are prefixed by property servletMediaPath. Warning: this tag is ignored for portlet installations.

property.name: documentBodyStyleClass
property.description: The default value used for attribute class of HTML tag BODY.

property.name: menuLayout
property.description: The default value used for attribute layout of tag panelNavigation.

property.name: menuStyleClass
property.description: The default value used for attribute styleClass of tag panelNavigation.

property.name: menuItemStyleClass
property.description: The default value used for attribute itemClass of tag panelNavigationItem.

property.name: menuActiveItemStyleClass
property.description: The default value used for attribute activeItemClass of tag panelNavigationItem.

property.name: footerStyleClass
property.description: The default value used for attribute styleClass of tag footer.

property.name: footerItemStyleClass
property.description: The default value used for attribute itemClass of tag footer.

property.name: footerText
property.description: The footer text printed by tag 'page'. If this property is ommited, no footer will be printed. If it is empty, a default value will be used.

property.name: labelStyleClass
property.description: The default value used for attribute styleClass of tag outputLabel.

property.name: buttonStyleClass
property.description: The default value used for attribute styleClass of tag commandButton.

property.name: inputFieldStyleClass
property.description: The default value used for attribute styleClass of tag inputText.

property.name: checkboxStyleClass
property.description: The default value used for attribute styleClass of tag SelectBooleanCheckbox.

property.name: dataTableHeaderClass
property.description: The default value used for attribute headerClass of tag dataTable.

property.name: dataTableFooterClass
property.description: The default value used for attribute footerClass of tag dataTable.

property.name: dataTableRowClass
property.description: The CSS class used for table rows.

property.name: dataTableRowAlternateClass
property.description: The CSS class used for alternate table rows.

property.name: dataTableColumnClass
property.description: The default value used for attribute columnClass of tag dataTable.

property.name: sectionTag
property.description: The tag used to wrap the input of tag 'section'.

property.name: sectionStyleClass
property.description: The default CSS class used for tag 'section'.

property.name: subSectionTag
property.description: The tag used to wrap the input of tag 'subSection'.

property.name: subSectionStyleClass
property.description: The default CSS class used for tag 'subSection'.

property.name: paragraphTag
property.description: The tag used to wrap the input of tag 'paragraph'.

property.name: paragraphStyleClass
property.description: The default CSS class used for tag 'paragraph'.

property.name: textStyleClass
property.description: The default CSS class used for tag 'text'.

property.name: paginatorStyleClass
property.description: The default CSS class used for tag 'paginator'.
